responses.content: Weâ€™re building an intelligent cloud, intelligent edge platform to span everything, including Azure, game streaming, Microsoft 365, and Dynamics 365. Our architectural advantage with hybrid solutions and our business model advantage with Azure benefits for Windows Server and SQL Server are driving strong performance.

Gaming remains a key focus with Xbox's strong community and monetization capabilities. Our investment in streaming through xCloud leverages our cloud infrastructure to deliver high-quality gaming experiences as a subscription service, enhancing reach and engagement.

GitHub remains a vital part of our developer strategy. We are committed to maintaining the GitHub community and fostering developer productivity. Our integration with Azure and support for open-source projects are essential to earning developer trust and expanding our ecosystem.

Dynamics 365 continues to evolve with a modular and extensible architecture powered by our Power Platform. We are focused on business process automation and are well-positioned to capitalize on shifts in business models and technology through both organic growth and potential acquisitions.

Azure bookings remained strong in Q1, supported by hybrid demand and Azure hybrid benefits. Our focus on capital efficiency across the intelligent cloud and edge platform ensures sustained growth and profitability in our cloud businesses.

Microsoft 365, encompassing Office 365, EMS, and Windows Commercial Services, continues to show robust growth. We are seeing strong customer demand for integrated security, management, and collaboration tools, which drives both user growth and revenue per user.

Commercial bookings grew by 16% despite a flat expiry portfolio, driven by renewals, expansions, and new long-term contracts. We expect some volatility in bookings due to large contracts and hybrid strengths, but overall commercial performance remains strong.

Windows 10 Pro continues to perform well, driven by corporate refresh cycles and strong demand for security and manageability features. We anticipate sustained demand as customers upgrade to modern hardware and leverage Microsoft 365 for deployments.
